attributes.action: RETAIN CORGI AS THE NAME PEOPLE TRUST IN THE GAS INDUSTRY
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: AFTER YEARS OF TRAINING THE PUBLIC TO RECOGNISE CORGI INSTALLERS THE NAME AND RESPONSIBILITY FOR GAS IS CHANGING TO CAPITA WHAT FOOL THOUGHT UP THIS ONE AND NOW AFTER YEARS OF CORGI WHO IS GOING TO BELIEVE ME IF I SAY I WORK FOR WHO CAPITA WHO ARE THEY? NEVER HEARD OF THEM HAVE YOU NOTHING BETTER TO DO THAN UPSET A SYSTEM THAT WORKS.

rejection.details: Please address the excessive use of capital letters; they make your petition hard to read.Your title and petition should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Statements that don't actually request any action
